Title: Freeport LNG feed gas supplies affected following storm
Description: Natural gas supplies via a key metering station supplying the 15 mtpa Freeport LNG export plant in Texas have been cut today following a force majeure brought on by a lightning strike.
Author: JS

Title: Global gas demand hits record high in 2024, led by power consumption due to extreme weather: IEA
Description: Global natural gas demand surged to a record high in 2024, increasing by 2.7%, or 115 billion m3, with natural gas seeing the strongest growth among fossil fuels, the International Energy Agency said in its Global Energy Review report published today.
Author: CK

Title: Trade supervisory board confirms Stade LNG superstructure is confirmed and approved
Description: The state trade supervisory office in Cuxhaven, Lower Saxony, has confirmed that the superstructure for the Stade floating LNG terminal—connecting the terminal’s floating storage regasification unit to the gas grid—is complete and approved, adding a new dimension to the ongoing dispute between project contractor Hanseatic Energy Hub and state-owned terminal operator Deutsche Energy Terminal.
Author: CK

Title: EU Council suggests amendments to proposal for gas storage flexibility to mitigate price spikes
Description: The Council of the European Union has suggested amendments to a proposal to introduce flexibility in gas storage refilling deadlines, aiming to curb price volatility and ensure a stable supply of gas, particularly ahead of the winter season.
Author: CK

Title: US Maritime Administration greenlights Delfin LNG project
Description: The US Maritime Administration has issued a license to Delfin LNG, authorizing the construction and operation of its proposed deepwater LNG export facility off the coast of Louisiana.
Author: CK
